title: CEP Entity Resolution Method Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for methods used to derive or confirm CEP Entity records from source data, referenced by resolutionConfidence.methodUri.

terms.label: Splink v4 Probabilistic Resolution
terms.definition: Entity resolution performed using Splink v4 with a probabilistic Fellegi-Sunter style model and calibrated match thresholds.

terms.label: Deterministic Rule-Based Resolution
terms.definition: Entity resolution performed using exact or near-exact deterministic rules (for example, matching on UEI or LEI plus exact jurisdiction).

terms.label: Manual Review
terms.definition: Entity resolution decisions reached through human review and adjudication, often informed by automated candidate generation.

terms.label: Authoritative Registry Link
terms.definition: Entity resolution performed by matching to an authoritative registry such as a corporate, charity, or governmental entity register.

terms.label: Probabilistic Resolution Method (Abstract)
terms.definition: An abstract parent term for methods that assign match probabilities based on statistical comparison of record fields.
